text: Hi there drew first of all I want to apologise for not replying sooner, currently I'm in my 3rd year of university in Staffordshire doing CGI and Visual effects. I've gained a large interest into lighting from one of our modules and I decided to research lighting for my dissertation! My goals I've been looking at jobs locally to my home location in Manchester and cloud imperium games have a studio based in wilsmlow with a lot of open vacancies, some for lighting artist and they've taken part in talks with our university etc. Thank you for your patience I really do appreciate it and I love to hear about you and your career!

If you want to know any information about my current work be happy to send it any time not quite sure how this system works I was just told by a colleague of mine but I look forward to hearing back from you!
